name: Red Cable Beanie
description:
Sweet and simple! Cute little hat with a cable right up the middle giving it that extra texture and interest. Comes in lots of trendy colors!

Handwashing is recommended.

name: Ruffle Layers
description:
Great little ruffle to add some texture and dimension to your photos!

44x12

name: Baby boy chunky newborn bonnet
description:
This super soft bonnet is great for baby boy photo sessions. I love the colors in this one!



Care: Hand was in cold water and lay flat to dry

name: Dusty Blue Newborn Baby Bonnet
description:
Sweet knit baby bonnet shown in the dusty blue color. Flower clip is not included but sold separately. This is a super soft blend so it is great next to babys skins.

Handwashing is recommended.

name: Lavender Newborn Pixie Bonnet
description:
This is a newborn hand knit pixie bonnet that was made in the very popular lavender color! This yarn is alpaca so it is super super soft!! 

It can be MADE TO ORDER in any color that you wish. Just send me a note and we can figure it out!

Available Sizes: (average baby sizes)

newborn up to two weeks 13" approx

0-3 months up to 14 "
3-6 months 14-16"


Care: Hand was in cold water and lay flat to dry.

name: Orange Ruffle Layering
description:
These ruffle layers measure about 62x13 stretched and add a great layer of texture!  

A few colors are sold out but I will keep trying to get them back in stock!

name: Newborn Stretch Wrap Photography Prop Purples and Greens
description:
This is *the* perfect prop for newborn photography. These stretch wraps are the perfect swaddling material for newborn photography sessions. The texture is an open weave knit and the generous amount of stretch lends to the perfect swaddle. Available in a variety of colors, please see my shop for other listings. 

Approximate dimensions: 60" x 18"

description:

description:

It can be MADE TO ORDER in any color that you wish. Just send me a note and we can figure it out!

name: Leaves Lace Stretch Wrap Layering
description:
Beautiful embossed leaves featured on this layering piece that would also be great as a wrap! Sooo much you could do with these pieces!

Dimensions are 14x72.

name: Joshua Layering Set
description:
Here it is! All the pieces you need to complete this super sweet picture! Included are a gray knit feathery ruffle layer, a thick and thin mini blanket in shades of aqua, jade and gray and a newborn button beanie to match! I can also get you a gray stretch wrap if you would like. Just let me know and I can send you a separate invoice.

Handwashing is recommended!

name: Feathery Ruffle Layering Pieces
description: Awesome pieces to create some great texture in your photos!  Has some ruffle and a bit of feather!

name: Jade Pixie Bonnet
description:
Love this new design of a pixie bonnet! Beautiful jade color with coordinating removable clip. Can be made in other colors. Just ask!

Will be sent in newborn size unless you state otherwise.

Made by me for you in my smoke free home.

Handwashing recommended.

name: Blues and Grays Thick Thin Mini Blanket
description:
Awesome pop of color with this mini blanket to pull things together!

Approximately 19x19

name: Sky Blue and Lavender Mini Blankets
description:
Perfect size little blanket to throw in your bowls and baskets for that awesome pop of color! These little blankets are about 19 inches square so there isn't a ton of bulk to try and hide. 

These are made to order so please allow 1-2 weeks processing time.  If you need in a shorter amount of time contact me and I will see what I can do!

Here the mini's are shown with two stretch wraps in light teal and lavender making one adorable twin picture!!

name: Joshua Button Beanie
description:
Love these chunky knit striped baby boy hats! Featured in blues, greens and grays-  but the possibilites are endless! If you have a special request of color just send me a note and I'm sure we can figure it out!

I will send in newborn size unless you ask for a different size.

The whole layering set is also available http://oopsiknititagain.bigcartel.com/product/joshua-layering-set



Made in my smoke free home. Handwashing is recommended.

name: Mia Layering Set
description:
I love everything about this set!  This set includes the soft pink flower blanket with scalloped edges, an aqua lace ruffle piece, and a simple tulle headband with pearls.

Made to match the Mia backdrop by Intuition Backgrounds by Becky Gregory http://www.intuitionbackgrounds.com/product/mia-rug-set and others in the summer collection in the same tones.

name: Sarah Layering Set
description:
Handmade taupe and mint flower blankets.  These are a great size for layering under baby, hanging out of buckets so the cute scallop edge hangs over, basket filler...the possibilities are endless!  Also included is a mint green ruffle wrap.  This also can be use for so many different things - swaddling, draping, layers etc.

This was made to specifically coordinate with 4 different backdrops from Intuition Backgrounds by Becky Gregory. http://www.intuitionbackgrounds.com/   It matches perfectly to the 'sarah', "mia", "madison" or "caralee" backgrounds.


Headband is not included.

name: Super Power Set
description:
Is this not just adorable!  This set includes two mini blankets in gray and white and a yellow ruffle layering.  Looks great in this set up and since they are such great neutral pieces can look good in so many different sets.

Super Hero Cape by: Bella Boo Bowtique

name: Ruffle Layering
description:

If you need in a shorter amount of time contact me and I will see what I can do!

name: 4 Mini Blankets Photographer Special
description:
Photographers Special!! You pick 4 of the colors you would like of the great little knit mini baby blankets.

Perfect size little blanket to throw in your bowls and baskets for that awesome pop of color! These little blankets are about 19 inches square so there isn't a ton of bulk to try and hide. They swaddle the baby up nice and snug too!

name: Hot Pink and Apple Green Mini Blankets
description:
Perfect size little blanket to throw in your bowls and baskets for that awesome pop of color! These little blankets are about 19 inches square so there isn't a ton of bulk to try and hide. 

These are made to order so please allow 1-2 weeks processing time.  If you need in a shorter amount of time contact me and I will see what I can do!

name: Pink Ruffle Wrap and Rosette Headband
description:
I sooooo love this fabric! Looks great thrown over a bean bag, draped over a chair for a backdrop, or swaddled tight around the baby! I have included with this ruffle wrap a shabby chic rosette headband that looks like a perfect match!

The blanket is 25x25 so it can be used in all the ways you would like. I love how soft, stretchy and lightweight this stuff is!

name: Oatmeal, Navy and Royal Mini Blankets
description:
Perfect size little blanket to throw in your bowls and baskets for that awesome pop of color! These little blankets are about 19 inches square so there isn't a ton of bulk to try and hide. 

These are made to order so please allow 1-2 weeks processing time.  If you need in a shorter amount of time contact me and I will see what I can do!
